name: Capybara
description: A giant, peace-loving rodent similar in appearance to a beaver.

name: Cat
description: A small feline useful for pest control.

name: Dog
description: A canine used for companionship or sometimes hard labor such as farm work or hunting.

name: Owl
description: A nocturnal bird of prey with excellent eyesight, usually used for hunting.

name: Pigeon
description: A common bird used to transport messages over long distances.

name: Raven
description: A highly intelligent black bird favored by wealthy people.
